commit message: Initial commit

First Commit.
Files and folders were generated by eclipse when a new Android Application Project is created.

Added first version of POM for Android Project.
Still does not compile. Not finding maven dependencies.

Now compiling under Maven and with no errors in Eclipse.
Android Lint crashes due to ADT issue 73002.
Added stub for Alarm Settings.
Added libs to POM.
Added pom from libdynticker and libpricealarm to install plugin in order to install their dependencies. Added build instruction to README.
Created app Settings activity and About dialog.
Moved activities to a package of their own.

Created wrapper to handle DB operations.
Modified ListAlarmActivity from Activity to ListActivity.
Created views for list and row.

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr

Conflicts:
AndroidManifest.xml
res/values/strings.xml
src/main/java/com/github/andrefbsantos/boilr/activities/AlarmListActivity.java
src/main/java/com/github/andrefbsantos/boilr/activities/AlarmSettingsActivity.java
Fixed declaration of AlarmCreationActivity and AlarmSettingsActivity in Android.xml.

Renamed package 'adaptar' to the correct name 'adapter'.
Removed the up hierarchy arrow which was added after incorrect merge by
andrefbsantos.
Removed unnecessary activity.

Renamed adpater package.
Renamed app settings xml.
Added AlarmWrapper which adds Android specific fields to an Alarm.
Added stubs of necessary services.
Saving before merge.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr
Alarm's rowview arranged to fit all parameters and button to control alarms added.

Moved domain and services to the correct package.
Finished StorageAndControlService interface.

Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:andrefbsantos/boilr.git

Conflicts:
src/main/java/com/github/andrefbsantos/boilr/database/DBManager.java
Saving before merge with remote repository
Corrected permission on Manifest.
ON/OFF set as string paramenters
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr

Added new methods to StorageAndControlService interface.
Finished first version of UpdateLastValueService.
Added BroadcastReceiver to start StorageAndControlService on boot.
AlarmListActivity now connects with StorageAndControlService to retrieve a list of alarms.
merged local repository with remote repository.

DBManager now has options to insert, update and delete Alarms from a database.
StorageAndControlService invokes the proper method from DBManager when an Alarm is added, changed or removed.
StorageAndControlService retrieves a Map with all Alarms and corresponding ID.
It also retrieves the next ID.
AlarmListActivity now binds with StorageAndControlServicem, through an Asynchronous call  and retrieves a list with all Alarms.
Changed method name from DeleteAlarm to deleteAlarm.

Changed how AlarmListActivity handles a click on on/off button to create an asynch call which retrieves the list o alarms from the StorageAndControlManager and changes the changes Alarm.
Fix a bug introduced by the on/off button which made the listener to detect clicks in a row and show settings go undetected.
Was asking for the Binder in the Intent instead of the Service.

Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:andrefbsantos/boilr.git

Conflicts:
src/main/java/com/github/andrefbsantos/boilr/services/UpdateLastValueService.java
AlarmListActivity events query StorageAndControlService and treat its response as callback.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr
Alarms can be deleted by swipping left or right in the list view, without animation.
Small refactorings while preparing for adding Alarm Notifications.
Added stub of service which handles notifications when alarms fire.

Added all code needed to fire visual and sound notifications.
New way to write to Log using a common tag.
View to create and display settings of an Alarm was created, but not implemented.

Notifications working. Moved operations which require network to
AsyncTasks.
Added dex compiling flags to POM.
Alarm settings swapping between price_hit and price_alarm.
Merge with repository.
Alarm creation settings updated with alert options.

Removed AlarmWrapper and put attribute in AndroidNotify.
Made AndroidNotify serializable.
Changed package to mobi.boilr.
Corrected bugs in Notifications.
Conflicts from previous merge resolved.

Honoured mobile data user settings.
Rearranged CPU Wake locks. Needs more testing.
Added stopSelf() to StorageAndControlService.
Added action bar icon for Alarm creation.
Corrected bug preventing correct assement of network state.
Saving local version with preference view built and setSummary from defualt options done for all preferences.
Merged local version with remote version and fixed mergind conflicts.

Corrected bug which prevented display of NotificationActivity when still
present in the notification drawer.
Modified in call notification to a low priority notification.
Added a notification to warn about missing internet connection.
Arranged NotificationActivity layout.
View and listeners for PriceHit implemented, missing creation and storage of alarm.
Merged with remote repository.

Added search functionality to AlarmListActivity and in the process
refactored AlarmListAdapter.
Alarm creation completed.

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr

Conflicts:
src/main/java/mobi/boilr/boilr/activities/AlarmListActivity.java

AlarmCreation implemented.
AlarmSettings implemented.
Update row's design.
Delete of Alarms on swipe fixed.

Sorted exchanges in alphabetical order.
Patched bug of illegal cast of Pair to CharSequence.
After alarm creation return to alarm list instead of showing a toast.
Do not start StorageAndControlService except on boot and on main
activity, in other places just bind to it.
Keep the exchange and pair when switching between Hit and Var alarm
during creation.

Vibrate preference now picks the default value.
EditText inputs now accepting only the correct number format.
Patched bugs on var alarm creation.
Added createAlarmAndReturn to encapsulated previously duplicated code
used for alarm creation.
Removed hardcoded strings from *CreationFragment.
Unit (percentage or coin ticker) added to summary of bound values and
variation.
Save local version before pull
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr

Fixed percentage and interval update display in AlarmListActivity's rowView.
Fixed settings view for both alarms types.

Added BullionVault and BTC38 exchanges.
Added hourly and twice a day as frequencies to check for new pairs.
Fixes #7.
Clarified description of price change alarm default update interval.
Fixes #6.
Price Variation renamed to Price Change. Fixes #8.
Adjusted display of time frame of Price Change alarm in Alarm List view.

Check pairs interval is now propagated to all loaded exchanges.
Removed search action bar button from application settings activity.
Removed code duplication on AlarmCreationFragment by creating
updatePairsList method.
Created updateDependentOnPair on AlarmCreationFragment which allows
preferences dependent on the selected Pair to react to a Pair change.
This allows upper and lower bound to get the last value. Fixes #11.
Summary of numeric preference fields still at null is not updated.
Added missing checks for network connection on StorageAndControlService
AsyncTasks.

OnSwipeListener modified to use AlarmListActivity connection instead of creating another connection.
Fixed delete of alarm not refreshing view of AlarmListActivity.
Rows of AlarmListActivity modified to support screens with different sizes.

Moved all functions which deal with number conversions to
utils.Conversions.
Values in alarm creation and settings are now displayed with their
complete decimal places. In the alarm list values are converted to
Engineering Notation. Fixes #13.
Disabled preference to change alarm type in alarm settings. Fixes #17.

Alarms are now restarted in the AlarmManager after changes to their
update interval. This makes sure they are run with the new update
interval.

Refactored alarm creation fragments. They are now able to rotate without
crashing. Alarm settings fragments are probably broken now. Will fix in
next commit.
Swipe animation implemented.

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr

Conflicts:
src/main/java/mobi/boilr/boilr/adapters/AlarmListAdapter.java
src/main/java/mobi/boilr/boilr/views/fragments/PriceHitAlarmSettingsFragment.java
Fixed how id was being passed from AlarmListActivity to AlarmSettingsActivity.
Bug fixed on swipe animation that crashed the listener when the background was swiped instead of a row.
NotificationKlaxon now honours the volume of the chosen ringtone type.
Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:andrefbsantos/boilr.git

Alarm creation stores ringtone type, sound and vibrate while changing
alarm type.
StorageAndControlService now does not crash when launched by Android
with a null Intent. Partial solution to #16.
Refactored rowView of AlarmListActivity to only use one view and support a specific landscape view.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr

Added a field displaying last value in alarm creation and settings.
Fixes #3.
UI no longer waits for retrieval of pairs and last value. This removes
the need for a loading indicator. Fixes #1.
BIG refactoring of creation and settings fragments. They can now be
rotated from vertigo to landscape and vice-versa.
Corrected print of bounds and change value in AlarmListActivity to avoid
superfluous decimal places.

Pre-release tag set to true. Simplified github-release-plugin
configuration.

Pairs' list is now cleared while retrieving pairs for a newly selected
exchange. This avoids consistency errors were the user could select a
pair which did not belong to the new exchange.
Same principle was applied to the display of last value.
Custom ListPreference with search for pairs implemented.
Added clickable donation addresses to README and About.
Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:andrefbsantos/boilr.git
Added string for content description about image for search in PairsListPreference
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr

Offed alarms are now updated when AlarmListActivity is opened. Closes
#12, closes #19.

Changing theme now working. Fixes #4.
AlarmCreationActivity now finishes after creating alarm. Furthermore, it
returns the alarm ID, allow its insertion in the alarm's list without
restarting AlarmListActivity. Fixes #21.
Now compiling against Android SDK 20.

Changed ListPreference to implement a responseive search.
Moved generic code from PairListAdapter to ListAdapter.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr
EditText on search row of pair list no longer loses focus.
ListAdapter is now superclass of AlarmListAdapter.
AlarmListAdapter recycles views.

Reworked PairListPreference into a generic SearchableListPreference.
Exchange's ListPreference in Creation/Settings of alarm changed to SearchableListPreference
Comments removed and correct indentation.
Now using Semantic Versioning.
Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:andrefbsantos/boilr.git

Added Coin-Swap exchange.
Displaying the full last value in the Full Screen Notification.
Melotic can now be selected as an Exchange.
Keyboard now dismisses when the user scrolls over a SearchableListView.

Added release profile to build an optimized, signed and aligned apk.
Moved res and manifest to conform to new Android directives.

Added instructions on how to build in release mode with proper signing.
Fixes #22.

Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:andrefbsantos/boilr.git

Conflicts:
res/values/strings.xml

Changed signing algorithm to SHA1withRSA. Fixes #23.
Search icon on Exchanges and Pairs lists now changes according to the
theme.
Forcing Wi-Fi on during sleep is forbidden since API 17. Added
troubleshooting to README.
Removed unnecessary prints.

Made lincense info more explicit in README.
Expanded app description in README.
Renamed title of 'Update interval' to 'Time frame' in Change Alarm
prefs.

Added Peatio, CHBTC and 796 Exchange.
Compatible with new libdynticker structure.
Fixed SearchableAdapter row size and added a responsive highligh to the selected row.

Fixed SearchableAdapter row size and added a responsive highligh to the selected row.
Fixes #25.
Added icon sketch.
Added highligh color to off alarms in alarm.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/andrefbsantos/boilr

Bound renamed to Limit. Closes #26
English revision on README and website link added.

Set version code to 1 to comply with F-Droid.
mvn package now buils an unsigned release mode apk to comply with
F-Droid.
Increased version numbers to check if fdroid checkupdates is working.
fdroid checkupdates is working. Reverting version numbers.
